definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]

sentences.english: The link between kuru and cannibalism seemed clear enough.
sentences.chinese: 庫魯病與喫人習慣之間的聯繫似乎是相當清楚了。

sentences.english: Kuru, a disease of natives living in New Guinea, was shown in 1959 to be similar to scrapei.
sentences.chinese: 庫魯病是一種在新幾內亞的土著人中傳染的疾病。
